49051.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あっ こんにち:
Oh, hello! Are you a traveler? This is Bolter's Bag Workshop, my father's workshop. The large item bags he makes can hold up to
100 different items, so they're very popular with travelers. But my dream is to travel around the world like a traveler rather than a
craftsman! My father says that's what I want to do. I'd like to hear about your travels, if you don't mind.

49052.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「よかった！ そ:

about. I know it's a small workshop, but
please take your time.

49053.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……うーん。:
Hmmm. I knew it. I understand. I'll ask my father when he comes back. But it's my father's rule that when he makes a bag for a
traveler, he asks the traveler to gather the materials himself. Well, there are two materials needed. First, Giant Lizard Skin
which is often dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Upper Jule Island, and Tanning Extract which is dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME1> in Muse Coast.
With these two items, you can make a big item bag that can hold 100 different items.

. Please be careful.

started making the bags instead. He taught me how to make them. But just like my father said, I didn't have the talent to be a bag-
maker.

72658.<center>ついに 究極のどうぐかばんの材料に\nふさわしい皮を見つけた。バ:
I finally found the right skin for the ultimate item bag, the Old Beast Skin of <%sev_que_name0> of the Budley Rock Zone. But
I am just a bag-maker, and there is no guarantee that I will make it back in one piece to challenge the monster. I'm leaving
this letter as a reminder. Tote, I had hoped that if you had the talent, you would follow in my footsteps and take over the workshop.
But you were too clumsy to be a craftsman. I hope you will forget my selfishness and fulfill your dream of becoming a traveler from
now on. Thank you for supporting me for so long. I loved the misshapen bags you worked so hard to make.

might be able to come up with a better idea. All I know is that the client is a guy named Pack from Gartlant Castle Town.
If you don't mind, could you go see the client for me? I can't leave the workshop!

185967.「……ところで どうして かばんが\n こんなことに？\n<br>\n「えっ？:
By the way, how did this happen to your bag? What? Were you a bag maker like me? So you knew that you could use Spring Leather to make
a bag that would hold everything in the palm of your hand. While I was fixing 's bag, I was thinking back to
when I first started making bags. It was really tough at first, because I didn't know what to do and how to do it. But there were
other young bag makers besides me, weren't there? That makes me kind of happy. I will try my best not to lose!
